div.script: jQuery(document).ready( function() { /* Define slider function */ var AIOSCycloneSliderResponsiveSlideshow = function(elem,settings) { var that = this; that.settings = settings; that.slideshow = jQuery(elem).find(".cycloneslider-slides"); that.slideshowInitialized = null; that.initialize(); that.lazyLoadImages(); }; AIOSCycloneSliderResponsiveSlideshow.prototype.initialize = function() { var that = this; /* Build slideshow */ that.slideshowInitialized = that.slideshow.cycle(that.settings.cycleOpts); /* Adjust slideshow size */ if ( that.settings.widthManagement == 'fixed' ) { that.slideshowInitialized.find(".cycloneslider-slide-js").each( function(i,v) { var canvas = jQuery(""); canvas.addClass("cycloneslider-slide-js"); canvas.width( that.settings.width ); canvas.height( that.settings.height ); canvas.attr("data-src",jQuery(v).attr("data-src")); jQuery(v).after(canvas); jQuery(v).remove(); }); } }; AIOSCycloneSliderResponsiveSlideshow.prototype.lazyLoadImages = function() { var that = this; that.slideshowInitialized.on("cycle-before", function(event, optionHash, outgoingSlideEl, incomingSlideEl, forwardFlag) { that.loadImage( jQuery(incomingSlideEl).find(".cycloneslider-slide-js") ); }); that.loadImage( that.slideshowInitialized.find(".cycle-sentinel .cycloneslider-slide-js") ); that.loadImage( that.slideshowInitialized.find(".cycloneslider-slide-image").not(".cycle-sentinel").find(".cycloneslider-slide-js") ); }; AIOSCycloneSliderResponsiveSlideshow.prototype.loadImage = function(image) { var src = jQuery(image).attr("data-src"); if ( jQuery(image).is("canvas") ) { jQuery(image).css("background-image","url(" + src + ")"); } else { jQuery(image).attr("src",src); } }; /* Set variables */ var settings = { cycleOpts : {}, widthManagement : "full", width : 1600, height : 795 }; /* Initialize slideshow */ new AIOSCycloneSliderResponsiveSlideshow( "#cycloneslider-hp-slideshow-1", settings ); });

div.p: Welcome to Danville.com. With 30 years of experience in the market, Steve Swepston understands how crucial it is to find relevant and up-to-date real estate information. Your search is over! Danville.com is designed to be your one-stop-shop for real estate in Contra Costa and Alameda Counties. This is the moment you should enjoy the most; checking out available properties and envisioning yourself living in your new dream home. You do not need another database that gives you rehashed property descriptions.
Instead, Danville.com gives you the opportunity to learn about and walk the community from the comfort of your own home. That is exactly what you get here. Danville.com was designed with you in mind.

li.p: From our first conversation, Steve Swepston impressed me with his drive to help my family get into our dream home. His knowledge of the steps involved and responsiveness to our many questions demonstrated what a real estate agent should be and do for his clients. You can tell he loves his job! I knew we

Steve is an extraordinary realtor! He follows through from beginning to end. He was always very timely in getting back to us with any questions or concerns we had throughout the transaction. Steve is very knowledgeable in all real estate related business and seems to actually enjoy his job, which in turn made us feel

Hi Steve, I was just thinking of you the other day. I was thinking about all the work that was involved with emptying out my Dad’s house and getting it ready for sale. You were SO KIND putting in endless extra hours and time and effort replacing lights, overseeing contractors, getting things to Goodwill, hosing

Steve, I hope you are doing well. Sorry it has taken me so long for this but it has been crazy with the new place and work. You really did a great job for us! I look forward to seeing you when we get to LA. Steve was a pleasure to work with. Very professional

This letter is a recommendation for Steve Swepston, who helped me purchase my first home. He came highly recommended by a dear friend. As a first time buyer, I was looking for an agent that would hold my hand through each step of the process and make it a quick purchase. I met Steve on

I had the pleasure of meeting Steve Swepston in March of the year. He was referred to me by my BofA loan officer. I must say that I was tremendously lucky to have met Steve and signed him on as my agent. After my initial conversation with Steve I started to develop a comfort level

div.div: Keep up to date with the latest market trends and opportunities in Contra Costa and Alameda counties.
